name: The Joyful Ghost
description:
The Joyful Ghost is a wholesome 2D puzzle solver for one player on PC. Play as a ghost who has been promised a second life by The Joyful Ghost Association. Help spread happiness by possessing the living and assisting those in need! That poor cat will starve if you don't get them a hotdog! Just be careful not to get anyone killed in the process.

Many art assets within the game are not created or owned by me.
